name: Dora the Explorer: Dora's Big Birthday Adventure
name_original: Dora the Explorer: Dora's Big Birthday Adventure
description:
Everyone is coming for Dora’s big birthday fiesta ...but where is the
birthday girl? Dora and Boots are trapped in Wizzle World! They need
your help to find the Wishing Crystal and get home. Magically ride on a
unicorn, explore the tree troops as Boots, and float over Sea Snake Lake
in a giant bubble! Just watch out for La Bruja! Happy Birthday, Dora!
¡Feliz Cumpleanos, Dora!
